title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Imperator Furiosa to escape a tyrannical warlord and his army.

title: John Wick
description: Former hitman John Wick seeks vengeance for the death of his beloved dog, unleashing a relentless and stylish action spree.

title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
description: Ethan Hunt and his team race against time to prevent a global catastrophe, facing danger and deception at every turn.

title: Wonder Woman
description: Diana, an Amazonian princess, discovers her true destiny as Wonder Woman, joining the battle against evil in World War I.

title: Black Panther
description: T'Challa, the Black Panther, must defend his kingdom and the world from powerful enemies after the death of his father.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker's chaos and anarchy as he tries to save Gotham City from descending into irreversible darkness.

title: Baby Driver
description: A young getaway driver with exceptional skills navigates through heists while listening to his carefully curated playlists.

title: Logan
description: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an aging Logan protects a young mutant girl with extraordinary powers.

title: Inception
description: Dom Cobb, a skilled thief, enters the world of corporate espionage by entering the dreams of others to steal their secrets.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes, including Iron Man, Captain America, and Thor, join forces to stop Loki and save the world.

title: Deadpool
description: Wade Wilson, a former special forces operative, becomes Deadpool, a wisecracking antihero with accelerated healing powers.

title: The Raid: Redemption
description: A rookie cop must navigate a high-rise building filled with criminals to bring down a ruthless crime lord.
Two British soldiers are tasked with delivering a vital message across enemy lines to prevent a massacre during World War I.

title: Tenet
description: A protagonist embarks on a time-bending mission to prevent World War III and uncover the mysteries of inversion.

title: Godzilla vs. Kong
description: Kong and Godzilla clash in an epic battle as humanity seeks to uncover the secrets behind the two powerful Titans.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: In the 1930s, a hotel concierge and his protégé become embroiled in a plot involving theft, murder, and a priceless painting.

title: Superbad
description: Two high school friends embark on a wild night of misadventures in their quest to buy alcohol for a party.

title: Bridesmaids
description: Annie's life unravels as she competes with her best friend's other bridesmaids to organize the perfect wedding.

title: The Hangover
description: Four friends embark on a bachelor party in Las Vegas that takes a hilariously chaotic turn when they wake up with no memory of the night before.

title: 21 Jump Street
description: Undercover cops Schmidt and Jenko infiltrate a high school to bring down a drug ring, but find themselves facing unexpected challenges.

title: The Nice Guys
description: A private investigator and a hired enforcer team up to solve the case of a missing girl and the mysterious death of a porn star.

title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
description: Ron Burgundy, a 1970s news anchor, faces challenges when a female journalist joins the newsroom, disrupting the all-male dynamic.

title: Shaun of the Dead
description: A slacker and his friends attempt to survive a zombie apocalypse while seeking refuge in their favorite pub.

title: This Is the End
description: Celebrities face the apocalypse during a star-studded party at James Franco's house in this hilarious and surreal comedy.

title: Jojo Rabbit
description: In Nazi Germany, a young boy discovers that his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home, leading to a whimsical and poignant exploration of tolerance and friendship.

title: Game Night
description: A group of friends' regular game night turns into a real-life mystery when one of them is kidnapped, leading to unexpected twists and hilarity.

title: Palm Springs
description: Two wedding guests find themselves stuck in a time loop, reliving the same day over and over, leading to unexpected bonding and self-discovery.

title: Borat Subsequent Moviefilm
description: Borat returns to America for a second adventure, bringing his unique brand of humor and satire to expose cultural and political absurdities.

title: Free Guy
description: A bank teller discovers he is a non-player character in a video game, prompting him to become the hero of his own story.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: A man is wrongly convicted of murder and forms a deep bond with his fellow inmates as he maintains hope for justice and freedom.

title: The Godfather
description: The powerful saga of the Corleone crime family unfolds, with themes of power, loyalty, and betrayal.

title: Schindler's List
description: In Nazi-occupied Poland, Oskar Schindler saves over a thousand Jewish lives by employing them in his factory during the Holocaust.

title: Forrest Gump
description: Forrest Gump, a man with a low IQ, experiences firsthand some of the most iconic events of the 20th century while pursuing his love, Jenny.

title: The Revenant
description: Frontiersman Hugh Glass embarks on a journey of survival and revenge after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by his expedition team.

title: The Social Network
description: The story of the founding of Facebook and the legal battles that followed, exploring themes of ambition, friendship, and betrayal.

title: Moonlight
description: A coming-of-age drama that follows a young African-American man named Chiron as he navigates his identity and sexuality in a rough Miami neighborhood.

title: The Shape of Water
description: In the Cold War era, a mute woman forms a unique bond with an amphibious creature being held captive at a high-security government lab.

title: La La Land
description: Aspiring actress Mia and jazz musician Sebastian fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles, facing the challenges of fame and success.

title: The Irishman
description: An aging hitman reflects on his life and involvement with the mob, spanning decades of crime and moral reckoning.

title: Manchester by the Sea
description: A man returns to his hometown to care for his nephew after the sudden death of his brother, dredging up painful memories.

title: Spotlight
description: A team of investigative journalists from The Boston Globe exposes the widespread sexual abuse scandal within the Catholic Church.

title: A Beautiful Mind
description: The true story of John Nash, a brilliant but troubled mathematician, as he struggles with schizophrenia and makes groundbreaking contributions to the field of game theory.

title: 12 Years a Slave
description: Based on the autobiography of Solomon Northup, a free black man who is abducted and sold into slavery in the pre-Civil War United States.

title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
description: The story of the infamous 1969 trial of seven defendants charged by the federal government with conspiracy and incitement to riot.

title: Blade Runner 2049
description: A young blade runner discovers a long-buried secret that could plunge society into chaos, leading him on a quest to find a former blade runner missing for thirty years.

title: Interstellar
description: In a future where Earth is dying, a team of astronauts embarks on a journey through a wormhole in search of a new habitable planet for humanity.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns the truth about his reality and joins a group of rebels to overthrow a powerful artificial intelligence that controls the world.

title: Arrival
description: A linguist is recruited to help communicate with extraterrestrial visitors whose mysterious arrival triggers global tensions.

title: The Martian
description: During a manned mission to Mars, an astronaut is presumed dead and left behind, leading to his struggle for survival and the efforts to rescue him.

title: Ex Machina
description: A young programmer is invited to administer the Turing test to an intelligent humanoid robot, leading to philosophical and ethical dilemmas.

title: Gravity
description: Two astronauts struggle for survival after their space shuttle is damaged, leaving them stranded in orbit with limited resources.

title: Elysium
description: In a dystopian future, a man with limited time to live takes on a mission to bring equality to a divided society by reaching the luxurious space habitat, Elysium.

title: Annihilation
description: A biologist joins a scientific expedition into a mysterious and expanding zone where the laws of nature are distorted, encountering strange phenomena and unknown dangers.

title: Edge of Tomorrow
description: A military officer finds himself trapped in a time loop, reliving the same battle against an alien invasion until he gains unexpected skills and allies.

title: Snowpiercer
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, the last remnants of humanity survive aboard a train that travels around the globe, but class divisions and injustices spark a revolution.

title: War for the Planet of the Apes
description: Caesar, the leader of evolved apes, embarks on a quest for revenge against the ruthless Colonel, leading to an epic battle for the future of both species.

title: Dune
description: In a distant future, young Paul Atreides must navigate political intrigue and the dangerous desert planet Arrakis, home to a valuable resource known as spice.

title: Get Out
description: A young African-American man uncovers disturbing secrets when he visits his white girlfriend's family estate.

title: A Quiet Place
description: In a world where creatures hunt humans using sound, a family must navigate their lives in silence to survive.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren are called to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

title: Hereditary
description: A family's dark secrets unravel after the death of their secretive grandmother, leading to horrifying and supernatural events.

title: The Babadook
description: A mother and son are haunted by a sinister presence that has emerged from a mysterious storybook.

title: The Shining
description: A family's winter retreat becomes a descent into madness as supernatural forces influence the father to violence.

title: Sinister
description: A true-crime writer discovers disturbing home movies that put his family in the path of a supernatural entity.

title: Annabelle: Creation
description: Years after a dollmaker's tragedy, he and his wife welcome a nun and orphans into their home, unleashing the malevolent presence of a possessed doll.

title: A Quiet Place Part II
description: Following the events of the first film, the Abbott family faces new threats as they continue to navigate a world where silence is survival.

title: Toy Story
description: Toys come to life when humans aren't around, and Woody, a pull-string cowboy, must deal with the arrival of space-themed Buzz Lightyear.

title: Spirited Away
description: During her family's move, a young girl enters a mysterious and magical world ruled by spirits, witches, and fantastical creatures.

title: Up
description: An elderly man fulfills his dream of visiting South America by tying thousands of balloons to his house, unintentionally bringing a young boy on an unforgettable adventure.

title: Zootopia
description: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

title: Coco
description: Miguel, an aspiring musician, embarks on a journey to the Land of the Dead to uncover the truth about his family's ban on music.

title: The Incredibles
description: A family of superheroes comes out of retirement to save the world from a new villain threatening humanity.

title: Shrek
description: An ogre embarks on a journey with a talkative donkey to rescue Princess Fiona and discovers the value of friendship and self-acceptance.

title: Finding Nemo
description: A clownfish named Marlin embarks on a journey across the ocean to find his son, Nemo, who has been captured by a scuba diver.

title: Ratatouille
description: A rat with a keen sense of taste aspires to become a chef in Paris, forming an unlikely alliance with a young kitchen worker.

title: Moana
description: Moana, a spirited teenager, sets sail on a daring mission to save her people, accompanied by the demigod Maui.

title: Inside Out
description: Emotions personified—Joy, Sadness, Fear, Disgust, and Anger—navigate a young girl's mind during a challenging time in her life.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
description: A young Viking befriends a dragon and works to create a peaceful coexistence between dragons and humans.
